prompts: Create a ghost-type Pokemon that embodies shadows and mystery with a playful personality.
I want a small, mischievous creature with fiery eyes and a stealthy appearance.
Generate a Pokemon design that features dark, shadowy hues with a bright accent.
Make a cute ghostly Pokemon with a combination of gray and green colors.
Imagine a mythical Pokemon that blends into the shadows and has a unique fighting style.
Design a Pokemon that has a bipedal stance and emanates an aura of secrecy.
Show me a Pokemon with a mischievous grin and a body that resembles a shadow.
